# mytidytuesday git repo

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of mytidytuesday is to hold the little projects, in the spirit of tidy tuesday.  

```{r, results='asis'}
library(magrittr)
webpages <- fs::dir_ls(type = "file", recurse = T, glob = "*.html")

webpages %>% 
  paste0("https://evamaerey.github.io/mytidytuesday/", .) %>% 
  cat()
```
